price: 42. Vervolgens na hen, hebben Wij een andere generatie geschapen.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qurūnan ākharīna
